PersonalStatement.text: Robin Miles, born on 1985-08-18, is a Male based in Rodriguezview, Macedonia. He is Divorced and holds Iranian nationality. Currently working at White, Carlson and Cohen.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Smith-Hunter from 2012 to 2017.
Senior Marketing Specialist at White, Carlson and Cohen, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Universidad Autónoma de Aguascalientes
Master's in Engineering from Sabanci University

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys reading.
